1: Yahweh, I have great troubles, so I call out to you.\q1
2:
Yahweh, hear me\q2 while I call out to you to have mercy on me!



\q1
3:
Yahweh, if you kept a record of the sins that we have committed,\q2 not one of us would escape from being condemned and punished!
\q1
4:
But you forgive us,\q2 with the result that we have an awesome respect for you.



\q1
5:
Yahweh has said that he would help me;\q2 I trust what he said, and I wait eagerly for him to do that.
\q1
7:
You, my fellow Israelites, confidently expect that Yahweh will bless us.\q2 He will bless us because he has mercy on us,
\q2 and he is very willing to save us.
\q1
8: It is he who will save us Israelite people from being punished for all the sins that we have committed.
